bug.Title: The 'Commit new file' button don't active on the file add page
bug.Description: The 'Commit new file' button don't active on the file add page after filling the valid file name
bug.Steps: <1>Open https://github.com</1> <2>Navigate to 'some repository'</2> <3>Press 'Add file' and chose 'Create new file'</3> <4>fill the file name vith valid data</3> <5>Look at the 'Commit new file' button</5>
bug.Expected: The 'Commit new file' button is active and file creates
bug.Actual: The 'Commit new file' button don't active
